messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hello? There's an emergency.
Okay, what's going on? Where are you calling from?
This is the BlocoBank at 1302 West International Speedway Boulevard.
Got it. Where in the bank are you?
He's saying he has a bomb, and he has a taser.
Okay, is he a white male, black male?
White male.
Alright. What is he wearing?
Black beanie, black hat, light beige-gray tweed jacket.
What else can you tell me about him? Where is he in the bank?
I'm not sure exactly. He's probably in our vault right now.
Okay, are you safe?
Yes, I'm hiding in the kitchen.
Who's in the vault with him?
Our service manager and our vault teller.
Alright. Stay on the line with me as long as you can. Any information you can get me would be very helpful.
One of the girls in the lobby saw him; he came to a platform person, not a teller.
Did he bring a bag with him?
Yes, a red duffel bag. He threatened to detonate the bomb if we called, so I'm hiding.
Did he mention any other weapons besides the bomb and taser?
No, that's all he said.
Alright. Did he display any other weapons?
No, but he mentioned he has a .45 caliber.
Okay. About how tall is he?
Six foot, middle-aged.
Alright. We have several units on the scene. Can you stay on the phone?
He just walked out. He's wearing a gray jacket, black beanie, black sunglasses, and carrying a big red bag.
Do you see which direction he went?
He's at the back door now. I see the police; they're pointing their guns at him.
Okay, try to stay hidden and safe. Just keep me on the line.
The cops got him. They have him at gunpoint.
Alright. Ensure everyone in the bank stays calm and away from the suspect.
They're telling us to lock down and get away from the area.
Yes, follow the officers' instructions. If they're telling you to evacuate, hang up and carefully listen to them.
Thank you for your help.
You did great. Stay safe and follow the officers' instructions.
